title: Ice. Cold.
author: VD
content_html:
“It’s really cool that Tom Brady got to be there for the Eagles’ two Super Bowl wins! He might be a good luck charm.”

Nick Foles

And this ad starring the two of them is hysterical. At least Tom can laugh at himself.
content_text:
